name: DrawingbySquares
0:
”Alexa, open Drawing Squares”
”I want to draw a turtle”
”Next picture”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drawing squares
des:
For this game you will need a piece of graph paper and colored pencils. Alexa will teach you how to draw nice pictures by coloring the squares. Animals, birds, transport, cartoon characters and more. Everyone will find something interesting to draw!

The game helps kids to develop imagination, memory, basic math and fine motor skills. It is also a great way of entertainment and meditation for adults.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
